ARABIC: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحًا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْلِحِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for those who make tawba and believe and act rightly, they will hopefully be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But he who repents and believes and does good things may well be among the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But those who repented and believed and acted righteously, they will perhaps be among those who will prosper there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, those who have repented and have become righteously striving believers will perhaps have everlasting happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So whoever repented and accepted faith and did good deeds, so it is likely that he will be among the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But as for him who repented, believed, and did righteous deeds, then perhaps he will be among those who are successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But as to him who repents and believes and does good, maybe he will be among the successful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for him who repents, and believes, and works righteousness, haply he shall be among the prosperers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But as for him who shall repent and believe and do right, he haply may be one of the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But as for him who repents and believes and does good deeds, he can hope to find himself among the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Howbeit, whosoever shall repent and believe, and work righteous works - belike he shall be of the thrivers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for him who repents, has faith and acts righteously, maybe he will be among the felicitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But any that (in this life) had repented, believed, and worked righteousness, will have hopes to be among those who achieve salvation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But as for him who repented (from polytheism and sins, etc.), believed (in the Oneness of Allah, and in His Messenger Muhammad SAW), and did righteous deeds (in the life of this world), then he will be among those who are successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, as for he who repents and believes, and does good deeds, he will be among those who prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But he who repents, and believes, and does righteous deeds, may well be among the winners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:67] But as for him who repents, of idolatry, and believes, in the affirmation of God’s Oneness, and acts righteously, he observes the duties [of religion], maybe he will be among the successful, those delivered according to God’s promise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But as for him who shall repent) from disbelief (and believe) in Allah (and do right) sincerely between him and his Lord, (he haply may be) "may be" in connection with Allah denotes a necessity (one of the successful) one of those saved from Allah's wrath and torment.
